Functions¶

pccc.main()¶

pccc.main(argv=None)¶

Run the default program.

Creates a ConventionalCommitRunner(); loads the configuration options; gets, cleans, and parses the commit; checks for exceptions; and exits the program with a 0 for success, 1 for failure. Additionally, the commit message is mirrored to standard output unchanged on failure.

pccc
